156573.「おおーい！ 誰か いねえかー！？\n 頼むっ 助けてくれー！<yesno><b:
Hey! Is there anybody out there? Please help
me!<yesno><break>

156574.「おおっ。今 返事が聞こえたぞ！\n ようやく 誰か 来てくれたんだな。\n<b:
Oh! I just heard an answer! Finally, someone came. I'm Holy Messenger. I came all the way to Muruel Forest to prepare for the Silver
Star Festival. But then... While I was here preparing for the festival, someone locked me in this Present Box! The sacred ribbon binding
the box won't be untied until the morning after the Starry Night of Silver and White. I can't go outside at this rate. So I have a
favor to ask you. I need you to get me out of this Present Box in a certain way!

156575.「そんな つれねえことを 言うなよっ！\n お前さんしか 頼れるヤツが いねえん:
Don't say such a trivial thing! You're the
only one I can rely on. Please, this is the
way!<bw_break>

156576.「頼むっ。白銀の星夜祭を 楽しみにしてる\n みんなのためにも オレを\n プレ:
Please. For the sake of everyone who is
looking forward to the Silver Star Festival,
please let me out of the Present Box!<yesno><break>

156577.「おおっ ありがてえ！ \n この箱を 縛っている 聖なるリボンの魔法は\n 聖:
Oh, thank goodness!The magic of the sacred ribbon that binds this box can only be broken by Sacred Scissors. You see those Sacred
Scissors around here? Just use it to cut the ribbon!

When I came to this forest to prepare for the Silver Star Festival, someone locked me in the Present Box! The sacred ribbon that binds the
box will not be untied until the morning after the Silver Star Festival, unless I have the Sacred Scissors. It seems the Sacred Scissors
have been taken by a mischievous <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> in these woods. You will have to defeat <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>, get the Sacred
Scissors, and get me out of this box! Try to do it as fast as you can!
